name: Us Navy Warship
description:
Us Navy Warship!!!
The special air combat force of shooter enemies have attacked the navy ship, seems like destroying the sky air craft in relentless way. This is the grand air helicopter sniper warship army gunner shoot war 3D of accurately aiming & targeting the opponent from the air 3D battle view. You will be playing as naval superhero air force sniper combat lethal assassin frontier, whose job is to take down & counter enemy terrorism in this intense sniper warship vehicular frontier combats game
Features:
- FPS (First Person Shooter) Game
- Excellent real look 3D environment
- Amazing Sounds
- Easy GUI and controls
